08-24785 | blank1_name = GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 0204715 | website = City of Englewood | footnotes = }} The City of Englewood is a home rule municipality located in Arapahoe County, Colorado, The town population was 33,659 at the 2020 United States Census. ==References== Category:Cities in Colorado
